title: GSE Opportunities : Government Office for Science (GO-Science) Roles ×5

content.text: The Government Office for Science (GO-Science) works at the heart of Government to ensure that policies and decisions are informed by the best scientific evidence and strategic long-term thinking. It is a very exciting time to join the organisation, we have unique and high-profile positions where you will have the opportunity to inform and influence policy making and the systems for use of science and engineering across government. Currently, GO-Science is expanding due to it's work on several key-Government areas, this week an additional 5 vacancies have gone live. Take a look below to see if a career in GO-Science is for you.

We are looking to recruit two analytical roles within the unit to deliver cross-Government analysis and assessment of the implications and impact of science and technology on HMG’s goals on economic policy, social policy and national security.
Vacancy reference: 123754, London ; closing date:  11:55 pm on Wednesday 16th June 2021

This vacancy is for the position of Capability & Delivery Lead within the Science, Technology and Innovation Insights unit. The unit is being established to deliver cross-Government analysis and assessment of the implications and impact of science and technology on HMG’s goals on economic policy, social policy and national security.
Vacancy reference: 124680, London ; closing date:  11:55 pm on Sunday 20th June 2021

The role will involve working across the newly-formed team to provide administrative support and executive assistance including diary support for the new Deputy Director. The post holder will be engaged in a wide range of administrative duties to support the creation of the new unit – maintaining key team documents such as project plans and risk logs, supporting knowledge and information management, supporting unit financial management and helping with recruitment and staff on-boarding.
Vacancy reference: 124704, London or Manchester ; closing date:  11:55 pm on Sunday 20th June 2021

This vacancy is for the position of Assessment and Insight lead within the unit. The unit is being established to deliver cross-Government analysis and assessment of the implications and impact of science and technology on HMG’s goals on economic policy, social policy and national security.
Vacancy reference: 123745, London ; closing date:  11:55 pm on Wednesday 23rd June 2021
Do you have an opportunity to share?

If you would like to publicise an opportunity in the next GSE Opportunities blog post, please send a summary of no more than 100 words with contact details or a link and a closing date to: gse@go-science.gov.uk
